headline: Lam Research Corporation (LRCX): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Lam Research Corporation (LRCX) on Substack by Daan Rijnberk. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on LRCX. Lam Research Corporation (LRCX)’s share was trading at $72.61 as of March 28th. LRCX’s trailing and forward P/E were 22.07 and 17.54 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Lam Research (LRCX), […]
